entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
